TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enable Gauranlen Tweaks
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: This entire section is disabled by default for compatibility sake mostly, some Gauranlen related tweaks function regardless of if they've been changed (any changing a radius for example) so this allows them all to be skipped over without any potential for conflicts if you prefer another gauranlen tweak mod.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Gauranlen Tree
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Tweaks specific to the Gauranlen tree itself.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Replantable Gauranlen
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes it so you can move Gauranlen trees like any other.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Artificial Building Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which a debuff is applied to the trees effects if artificial buildings are built in it.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Initial Connection Range
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Initial connection strength will be a random value in this range.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Connection Gain
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The amount of connection gained for each hour of pruning.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Connection Loss
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: A multiplier on the loss rate of the connection.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Connection Loss From Buildings
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: A multiplier on the loss rate of the connection specifically due to artificial buildings in range.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Moss Growth Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which gauranlen moss will grow inside.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Moss Growth Days
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The number of days it takes for gauranlen moss to grow to maturity.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Dryads
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Tweaks specific to the dryads that come from the Gauranlen Tree.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Max Dryads
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Max number of dryads when connection is full. This is technically done on a point curve with multiple values, but to keep it simple I just distribute the max linearly through it.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Dryad Spawn Days
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Number of days between the spawning of Dryads.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Dryad Cocoon Days
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Number of days Dryads remain in their cocoons.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Gaumaker Cocoon Days
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Number of days Gaumaker Dryads remain in their cocoons.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Gaumaker Pod Days
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Number of days it takes for a Gaumaker pod to mature.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Gaumaker Seed Yield
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Number of seeds obtained from a Gaumaker pod.
